mapper.sql: id, thid,inportName, buidEmail, buidMobile, addtime, mobile, email, status,ufrom
mapper.insert: insert into importusermap (id,thid,inportName,atsName,buidEmail, buidMobile, addtime, mobile, email, status,ufrom) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{thid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{atsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buidEmail,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buidMobile,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ufrom,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM importusermap WHERE thid = #{userId} AND ufrom = #{ufrom}
